document.full_text: at least 40,000 "red shirt" protesters massed in bangkok saturday to mark the anniversary of a 10-week rally that plunged thailand into prolonged violence and political chaos last year.
document.title: thai "red shirts" mark anniversary of protest
lines_and_colors: at least 40,000 "red shirt" protesters massed in bangkok saturday to mark the anniversary of a 10-week rally that plunged thailand into prolonged violence and political chaos last year.
